results.name: Row sums of number triangle A106270.
comment: To prove _R. J. Mathar_'s conjecture, let A(x) be the g.f. of the current sequence. We note first that

link: Michael De Vlieger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1669
formula: G.f.: c(x)*sqrt(1 - 4x)/(1 - x), where c(x) is the g.f. of A000108.
a(n) = Sum_{k = 0..n} 2*0^(n-k) - C(n-k), where C(m) = A000108(m) (Catalan numbers).
a(n) = 2 - A014137(n) for n >= 0 and a(n) = 1 - A014138(n) for n >= 0. - _Alexander Adamchuk_, Feb 23 2007, corrected by _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jul 22 2019
xref: Cf. A014138, A014137 (partial sums of Catalan numbers (A000108)).
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Apr 28 2005
